review: i had gone in for teeth scaling and cleaning, in the past i have had horrible experiences with other dentists hence for a long time i had skipped it, but being a smoker i had to get it done sooner or later. was pleasantly surprised 1st at the place, very upscale, and clean. 2nd the staff was very cordial and understood what i wantes. most importantly dr.anshul is extremely professional in his work, i didn't even feel a slight bit of pain during the entire cleaning process.  highly recommend my my side.

Dr.anshul sir is a vry humble person as I met him through practo nd was dealing with severe toothache nd disturbed allignment for my teeth as of which it was vry difficult for me to chew food since vry long i went to different dentist but was not satisfied by their results accidentally met anshul sir nd I dnt how he did that magic nd my teeth are so better from wht it was before he is a magician who made my teeth strong nd beautiful as of which now I dnt have any problems with my teeth tysm anshul sir cannot thankyou in words hope uh have branches in Jammu as well
